description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Gather your friends and family for an exciting 4-player adventure!  Gather armies of bugs to build the largest hoard, then convert them into 3 different attack bugs to be the last bug standing!  With 7 levels, 4 difficulty levels, and great artificial intelligence, prepare yourself for hours of competitive game play!
